content.rendered:
Mission

To organize, utilize and direct our substantial resources of parents, teachers, students and funding in directions that will enhance the educational experience for all; and to provide a conduit for communication and collaboration between Maple Avenue parents, teachers, administrators and students.

2024-2025 Board Members

  • President:  Nicole Messier 
    Email: MAPNBoardPresident@gmail.com
  • Parent Involvement Chair:  Danielle Bedard 
    Email: MAPNinvolvement@gmail.com
  • Fundraising Co-Chairs:Audrey Akland & Tamie Ehinger
    Email: MAPNfundraising@gmail.com
  • Communication Chair: Rebecca Carulli 
    Email: MAPNcommunication@gmail.com
  • Arts in Education Chair: Amanda Ellithorpe
  • Treasurer: Erin Freeh 
    Email:  mapntreasury@gmail.com
  • Secretary: Tara Fear
    Email:  mapnboardsecretary@gmail.com
Follow us on Facebook for upcoming events and volunteer opportunities:

www.facebook.com/MapleAveParentNetwork.

Membership Drive

Welcome to the 2024-25 school year! MAPN Membership Drive is LIVE!
Family membership is only $10. Your donation will fund enrichment programming, school events, staff appreciation, classroom requests, student financial assistance, advocacy and support to foster a welcoming school community. 
Link to registration page: https://mapnmembership2024-25.cheddarup.com

Fundrasiers: 

Chipotle Fundraiser:September 7th from 5-9 pm (flyers attached)
Make dinner a selfless act by joining us for a fundraiser to support Maple Avenue Parent Network. Come to the Chipotle at 3057 Route 50 Ste 5 in Saratoga Springs on Wednesday, September 13th between 5:00pm and 9:00pm. Bring in this flyer, show it on your smartphone or tell the cashier you’re supporting the cause to make sure that 33% of event sales subject to a $150 minimum will be donated to Maple Avenue Parent Network.
NEW! ORDER ONLINE FOR PICKUP: Use code 49WD7BN in ‘promo’ field before checkout. Orders placed online or through the Chipotle app for pickup using this unique code will be counted. Remember, delivery orders or orders placed at a different time/location than the scheduled fundraiser will not count.

Forms:

  • Maple Avenue Parent Network Volunteer Form
  • Maple Avenue Parent Network Funding Request Form
